dict.acceptation: 离开；放弃，抛弃；停止，中断；偿清；
自由的；摆脱了责任或义务的；

sent.orig: Quit, quit for shame! This will not move.
sent.trans: 放手，为这羞惭放手！她这样难以感动。

sent.orig: But a real warrior will never quit, don't worry, master! I'll never never quit!
sent.trans: 但真的战士绝不言弃别担心大师我永远不会放弃的！

sent.orig: Quit don't quit. Noodles don't noodles.
I quit this inhuman job. I quit working for a machine.
sent.trans: 不干这份非人的工作了，我不要再为一部机器干活。

sent.orig: So, please quit the cold turkey and eat more vegetables and fruits!
sent.trans: 所以，在戒烟的同时不要忘记多吃点水果与蔬菜！
